resources.string: Do you really want to leave the app?
To use firday, you have to put this phone into the provided case.
There was an internal error while processing your request.
Do you really want to sign out?
By deleting your account you agree that all data which is part of this account will be deleted forever.
The deletion process was canceled. This error may occurs because the internet connection is unstable or not existent
If no account is existent, we wil automatically create a new one.
This feature is non-existent in the current version
This is an example of the TextWidget.
What usage data we can collect:
Usage data of features we consider causing crashes of the friday app
App usage time and average usage time of certain features
Usage time and way of the AR-feature
We only collect usage data we consider to be helpful in the development and improvement of this app. All collected data will be deleted after it has been reviewed by our support.
We collect following metadata about your device:
The Android SDK Version of your device
The android version your device is running on
Please check if you entered an email address and if you are connected to a network

friday is powerful. We turn your phone into a competent HeadUp Display Client, which is compatible with our high-qualtiy AR-glasses. Use \"Widgets\" to convert friday into an assistant - display every info you need from simple text to google calendar events without even touching your device.
You either need to allow the collection of device usage data or specify your feedback in the feedback body.
You can\'t use this version of friday with an older version installed at the same time. \n \n You only have to do this once.
This channel is used to notify about new Updates.
friday is ready to update to %s !

You can manually check for updates by opening the \'About\' page of this app.
The device is running on low memory, which may causes performance lags in the VR-Mode. Please try to free up space in order to guarantee a good performance.
You should turn off the energy saver mode in order to experience a good performance when using the AR-mode
Issues while trying to log in
The app is useless to me
I don\'t have got the required hardware (such as AR-lasses etc.)
Do you want to terminate this session?

This app supports vertical plane detection. To make it work, you should search for remarkable surfaces such as brick-walls, or walls with images, posterrs etc. Detected walls will show the same indicator as horizontal detected surfaces.
The ArCore-Application is missing on this device. Please visit Google Play, install Google ArCore and retry.
The installed version arcore is outdated to be used with this app. Please ensure that the newest version of ArCore is installed and retry.

The SDK is outdated for the installed version of ArCore. Please ensure that the newest version of friday is installed. If this problem persists, you can try to contact us or wait until this app receives an update.
Your device is incompatible with ArCore.
We need these permissions to provide basic features.
The camera permission is needed to use fridays main feature: The AR-mode
The mircophone is needed to be able to use the voice assistant.
Show heat warning when starting actionmode
Add additional, more detailed debug infos
The chosen file has an inappropriate extension and cannot be loaded.
This channel notifies you about the status of the installed plugins when, for example, the progress of an installiong plugin changes.
You must select a friday plugin file (*.fpl)
But you can still get Friday on any Android device with Android 8.0 or higher!
Could not upload feedback. Most likely you are not signed in. Please sign in first and then retry.
You need to grant the storage permission in order to access your files.
This application requires ArCore to be installed on this device, but the installation was declined. Please install ArCore and retry.
